titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the UE Publications Collection, 1936-1990s UE.8.1
titlestmt.author: Zachary Brodt.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-07-08 17:41:46 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: UE Publications Collection

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United Electrical, Radio and Machine Workers of America

did.abstract: The United Electrical, Radio, and Machine Workers of America (UE) utilized various publications at the national, district, and local levels to disseminate information to its members. This subgroup contains publications created and collected by the UE. Included are informational booklets, shop papers, bulletins, and company newsletters.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This subgroup contains newspapers, newsletters, booklets, pamphlets, leaflets, and bulletins created by the UE, companies, and other unions regarding local and national labor issues and union organizing. Many company publications are from Westinghouse and General Electric. Topics of interest include Communism, political action, and UE accomplishments. Publications collected by the Research Department have been retained in record group UE 10 Research Department. Organizer's Bulletinscan be found in UE 7-4 UE Organizer's Bulletins.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The entirety of this collection has not been arranged; however, an inventory exists for many of the publications created between 1936 and the 1970s. Please contact the Archives Service Center for more information.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the United Electrical, Radio, and Machine Workers of America in 1976, 1986, 1997, and 2004.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: UE Publications Collection, 1936-1990s, UE.8.1, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: UE Publications Collection, 1936-1990s, UE.8.1, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was originally processed by Archives Service Center staff. A processing plan for this collection was written by Zachary Brodt in June 2008. This finding aid was written in March 2009.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: UE Organizer's Bulletins 1937-1977, UE.7.4, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
